solution_line_template: First multiply the number of spots on the left side by {multiplier}: {spots_left_side} spots * {multiplier} = <<{spots_left_side}*{multiplier}={spots_left_times_three}>>{spots_left_times_three} spots

Then add {additional_spots_right} to find the number of spots on the right side: {spots_left_times_three} spots + {additional_spots_right} spots = <<{spots_left_times_three}+{additional_spots_right}={spots_right_side}>>{spots_right_side} spots

Then add the number of spots on each side to find the total number of spots: {spots_right_side} spots + {spots_left_side} spots = <<{spots_right_side}+{spots_left_side}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} spots
